title: Federal Regulators Are Needed for Crypto Oversight: U.S. Accountability Office

title: Initial Exchange Offering (IEO): Is This Crypto-Finance Model Better Than ICO?
description: The world of finance has been revolutionized by the advent of blockchain technology, and one of the major developments in this sphere is the Initial Exchange Offering (IEO). title: Bitcoin Supply In Profit Drops Significantly As BTC Price Staggers At $29K Levels
description: The recent drop in the spot price of Bitcoin from $30,263 to $29,201 has resulted in -1.11 million BTC (equivalent to -5.9% of the total supply) going into an underwater position. title: Binance and CZ file motion to dismiss CFTC’s lawsuit
description: Binance, its CEO Changpeng Zhao (CZ), and the company’s former compliance chief Samuel Lim seek to dismiss the complaint filed by the US CFTC. On March 27, 2023, the Commodity Futures Trading Commission took legal action against Binance for violating…

title: President Signs Digital Ruble into Law Paving the Way for CBDCs – Crypto Community Rejects Control With Bitcoin
description: Russia’s President Vladimir Putin has signed the digital ruble bill into law, allowing the central bank to issue its own digital currency, set to take effect from August 1, 2023. The digital ruble will act as a payment and money transfer method, but its use will be voluntary, not forced upon citizens. In a significant [...]

title: Crypto Analyst Predicts Stellar Rise for Solana – Foresees Over 870% Surge on The Back of Ethereum’s Success

title: Bitcoin Could Witness Deep Correction As BTC Flashes Vibes of 2022 Bear Market, Warns Top Analyst
